author: Jeremy Clutterbuck
comment: This is very useful when you don't have WiFi or mobile data signal for OK Google. Used in conjunction with Wear mini launcher it is very convenient. However, I would like an optimised version for round watch face (LG G watch R) - probably just requires slightly smaller icons! I'd also like to see the dialer as a right swipe action rather than at the end of the contacts! I was a bit surprised at the price, but I paid it so you got me. But otherwise just what I was looking for.
title: Pretty good

author: othmans1
comment: It doesn't work most of the time
title: Doesn't work most of the time

author: Stewart Clarke
comment: I so want this app to work... but on my Note 3 it hardly ever dials... making the app totally useless.
title: So not reliable

author: Dw T
comment: Love this dialer!  Please make more cool apps!!! Like a speed dial widget I can access from watch face with like 2 clicks... keep up the great work! !!
title: Be patient and it's great!!!

author: Dusty Baker
comment: Hasn't worked since the first day eveytime i dial it says connecting and never connects! I want a refund!!
title: Android wear speed dial

author: Dim Dayz
comment: Images still dont allow editing(selecting), but dialing seems to be working now. Is there any way to make the Speed Dialer icon stay on your notification bar so that it can't be cleared and stop connection ?
title: Images Don't Stay Set

author: Joseph Miller
comment: Great idea, however it force closes constantly on my phone.

reply.author: John Li
reply.content: Hi, please update to 1.0.3 (we just released it), that should be fixed. Please send us email if you have further questions.

title: Awesome idea!

author: Dave Spina
comment: Really no need with Ok Google command
title: Works but...
